Bloodgrass.details: **Special (Potion Effect):** Can combine with any other **Potion Effect** ingredient to become a food source for 1 day. Cannot be altered by other ingredients.

Chromus Slime.details: **Special (Potion & Toxin Modifier):** The final **Effect** after all other calculations is the exact opposite. This is up to the DM’s discretion on the specifics per potion/poison.

Dried Ephedra.details: **Potion Modifier:** Increase the dice-type by 1 size for any healing **Effect.**

Emetic Wax.details: **Special (Potion & Toxin Modifier):** Delay the **Effect** of an ingredient this was combined with by 1d6 rounds.

Fennel Silk.details: **Potion Effect:** Stabilizes body heat to resist cold weather or wet condition penalties for 1 hour. Cannot be altered by other ingredients.

Gengko Brush.details: **Potion Modifier:** Double the dice rolled of any healing **Effect**, but divide the total of the dice by 2 (rounding down); Then, the recipient receives that amount of healing per round for 2 rounds.

Hyancinth Nectar.details: **Potion Effect:** Removes 1d6 rounds of poison in the target’s system, but cannot remove it completely. One round of poison damage will still occur at minimum.

Lavender Sprig.details: **Special (Potion & Toxin Modifier):** Makes the potion or toxin more stable and safer to craft.

Mandrake Root.details: **Potion Effect:** Reduce any disease or poison’s potency by half for 2d12 hours. Only hinders already existing poisons or diseases in the body. Cannot be altered by other ingredients.

Milkweed Seeds.details: **Potion Modifier:** Double the dice rolled of any healing **Effect**, but remove all Alchemy Modifier bonuses. This modifier can stack.

Arctic Creeper.details: **Toxin Modifier:** Change poison damage to cold or necrotic damage; target is still *[poisoned]* for 1 minute on a failed **CON** saving throw; this toxin is still considered poison damage when combining with other ingredients.

Amanita Cap.details: **Toxin Modifier:** Changes any poison **Effect** to be non-lethal and only incapacitate the target.

Basilisk Breath.details: **Special (Toxin Effect):** Slowly paralyzes opponent. Target makes a DC 5 + *Alchemy Modifier* CON saving throw each turn for 4 turns. While under this affect, target is considered slowed by the slow spell. On a failed save, the target is considered *[paralyzed]* for 4 rounds. Cannot be modified or altered by other ingredients.

Cactus Juice.details: **Toxin Modifier:** The target will not notice any poison damage **Effect** in their system until they take 5 rounds of damage from the toxin.

Drakus Flower.details: **Toxin Modifier:** Change poison damage to fire or acid damage; target is still *[poisoned]* for 1 minute on a failed CON saving throw; this toxin is still considered poison damage when combining with other ingredients.

Frozen Seedlings.details: **Toxin Modifier:** While *[poisoned],* target’s movement speed is reduced by 10 ft for 1 minute. Cannot be altered by other ingredients.

Harrada Leaf.details: **Toxin Modifier:** While *[poisoned],* target’s movement speed is reduced by 10 ft for 1 minute. Cannot be altered by other ingredients.

Quicksilver Lichen.details: **Toxin Modifier:** Double the dice rolled of any **Toxin Effect,** but reduce that **Effect** duration by half. This modifier can stack.

Radiant Synthseed.details: **Toxin Modifier:** Change poison damage to radiant damage; target is still *[poisoned]* for 1 minute on a failed CON saving throw; this toxin is still considered poison damage when combining with other ingredients.

Spineflower Berries.details: **Toxin Modifier:** Increase the dice-type by 1 size for any **Toxin Effect.**

Wyrmtongue Petals.details: **Toxin Effect:** 1d4 + Alchemy Modifier poison damage per round; target is *[poisoned]* for 1 minute.

Arrow Root.details: **Enchantment:** +1 to attack rolls for one minute when applied to a weapon.

Elemental Water.details: **Special (Enchantment):** This is required as the base catalyst for all **Enchantment** ingredients. See **Appendix B** for details.

Nightshade Berries.details: **Enchantment:** The effect of this “potion” is similar to the *oil of slipperiness* (DMG 184).

Primordial Balm.details: **Enchantment:** User creates a *potion* of *frost/fire/stone giant strength* (DMG 187).

Silver Hibiscus.details: **Enchantment:** When consumed by target, they can unleash a random elemental *breathe weapon* 3 times (PHB 34). Cannot be altered by other ingredients.
